alert.note: Alert for Rankin; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 8:18PM CDT until June 16 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rankin County in central Mississippi... Central Simpson County in central Mississippi... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 818 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mendenhall, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mendenhall, Pinola, Union, Sanatorium, Martinville, Cato, Johns, Harrisville, Piney Woods, Shivers, D`Lo and Braxton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
